MESSAGES.LINK_TO_ANOTHER_APP: This link follow to another application or site

MANUAL.TITLE: Manual
MANUAL.DESCRIPTION: This project is a PWA (Progressive Web Application) created as diploma project to KhNUE (Kharkiv) for indoor navigation Unlike most similar solutions uses QR codes as reference points for positioning instead of radio waves (GPS, WIFI, Bluetooth).

INTERFACE.TITLE: Interface
INTERFACE.MAIN_MAP_DESCRIPTION: This application element will display the shortest path between the audiences you selected.
INTERFACE.START_POINT_DESCRIPTION: This element of the application allows you to select the starting point for finding a route.
INTERFACE.FINISH_POINT_DESCRIPTION: This element of the application allows you to select the point to which you plan to go.
INTERFACE.FLOOR_SWITCH_DESCRIPTION: This element of the application allows you to switch the building map to another floor.
INTERFACE.ZOOM_EDIT_DESCRIPTION: This element of the application allows you to change the scale of the building map.
INTERFACE.SETTINGS_DESCRIPTION: This application element opens the personal settings panel.
INTERFACE.MANUAL_DESCRIPTION: This element of the application opens the panel of the quick guide for using the application.

INFO.FOOTER: KhNue named after S.Kuznets - Diploma project
